edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_library.patron

Interface AccountManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LibraryAccountSystem

    public interface AccountManager
    Describes behaviors of a patron management systems that permits user login. The management system has an administrator.
    Author:
    Jo Perry

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Add a new patron to the patron database.

    • Method Detail

      • login

        void login(java.lang.String id,
         java.lang.String password)
        Logs a user into the system.
        Parameters:
        id - user's id
        password - user's password
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if a patron or the administrator is already logged in
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the patron account does not exist

      • logout

        void logout()
        Logs the current patron or administrator out of the system.

      • getCurrentPatron

        Patron getCurrentPatron()
        Returns the currently logged in user.
        Returns:
        the currently logged in user.

      • isAdminLoggedIn

        boolean isAdminLoggedIn()
        Is an administrator logged into the system?
        Returns:
        true if yes, false if no

      • isPatronLoggedIn

        boolean isPatronLoggedIn()
        Is a patron logged into the system?
        Returns:
        true if yes, false if no

      • addNewPatron

        void addNewPatron(java.lang.String id,
                java.lang.String password,
                int num)
        Add a new patron to the patron database. The administrator must be logged in.
        Parameters:
        id - new patron's id
        password - new patron's password
        num - number associated with this patron
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the database is full or the administrator is not logged in
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if patron cannot be added to the patron database

      • cancelAccount

        void cancelAccount(java.lang.String id)
        Cancel a patron account.
        Parameters:
        id - patron's id
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the administrator is not logged in
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if patron cannot be removed due to some error

      • listAcounts

        java.lang.String listAcounts()
        List all patron accounts.
        Returns:
        string of patron ids separated by newlines
